survey_content: Visit our fanpage facebook to receive the latest news and customer support
content_not_support_audio: This movie has audio which is not supported by BeeTV, please install VLC player to play audio.
update_content:
Update version 2.1.2


- Fix bugs.



Update version 2.1.1



- Download on Filelinked with code: 30837432

- Download on FireDL with code: 246959.

- Fix trailer on Firestick, FireTV, Nvidia Shield and other Android boxes.

- Add feature to backup and restore watchlist, watched history.

- Add feature to auto backup before updating.

- Add feature to auto play next episode. You can choose number of link to auto play.

- Fix keyboard hide screen when logging to trakt on some devices.



Update version 2.1.0



- Fix bugs.



Update version 2.0.9



- Add feature to choose default play action in setting.

- Add Christmas section.

- Add 4k links for Real-debrid user.

- Update Internal Player.

- Fix layout on some Android boxes.

- Fix bugs.



Update version 2.0.8



- Hot fix not showing season from tv shows.



Update version 2.0.7



- Optimize search function.

- Add feature to mark watched movie, can sync with trakt.

- Add feature to change poster size.

- Add feature to choose default movie and tv show category.

- Add category latest, now playing, popular, top rated, upcoming for movies.

- Add category airing today, popular, top rated for tv shows.

- Add feature to hide unaired season and episode.



Update version 2.0.6



- Add feature to auto play next episode.

- Fix trailer on Nvidia Shield.

- Fix some critical bugs.



Update version 2.0.5



- Add more HD movie and tv shows sources.

- Fix bugs.



Update version 2.0.4



- Add feature to download watched history from Trakt in setting.

- Add feature to mark episode as watched.

- Add sort A-->Z on watchlist and collection.

- Add trailer in movies/tv shows.

- Add FAQ.

- Add ability to choose default tab.

- Add feature to force Android TV mode, only use on some Android TV box.

- Give MX Player Pro priority when choosing MX Player in setting

- Add year of movies/tv shows on search suggestion.



Update version 2.0.3



- Fix watchlist not showing.

- Fix crash on some devices.
